abstract: Mr. Kwiecien, his surgeon and manager reported in a conference call that "his recovery is progressing at a remarkable pace," Peter Clark, the Met spokesman, wrote in an e-mail.
snippet: Mr. Kwiecien, his surgeon and manager reported in a conference call that "his recovery is progressing at a remarkable pace," Peter Clark, the Met spokesman, wrote in an e-mail.

headline.main: Mariusz Kwiecien Set to Return to Met Stage
headline.print_headline: After Surgery, Baritone Ready for ‘Don Giovanni’
